author: Daniel Henninger
title: Trump’s Irrelevant Tariffs
text:
A never-to-be-forgotten line that burst out of Donald Trump during the campaign was: “We’re going to win so much, you’re going to be so sick and tired of winning.” With President Trump currently drafting much of America into his trade war with the world, we may be there. 

This week, the Trump trade team and China traded $50 billion tariff salvos. A day or so earlier, Mr. Trump threatened again to end the North American Free Trade Agreement. He is sending the National Guard to the border. He threatened steel and aluminum tariffs...
